TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示顯示資料繫結控制項中自訂內容的欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 來顯示每一筆記錄顯示的自訂內容。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display custom content for each record displayed. 當您需要在未提供的其中一個預先定義的資料控制項欄位的資料繫結控制項中顯示內容 (例如)，使用類別來建立自訂使用者介面 (UI)。When you need to display content in a data-bound control that is not provided by one of the predefined data control fields (such as ), use the class to create your custom user interface (UI). 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a object as a column, and the control displays it as a row. 您可以定義不同的組件的自訂範本物件使用下表所列的範本。You can define a custom template for the different parts of the object using the templates listed in the following table. |範本Template|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要顯示的替代項目中的內容物件。Specifies the content to display for the alternating items in a object.| ||指定要顯示在編輯模式中的項目內容物件。Specifies the content to display for an item in edit mode in a object.| ||指定要顯示的頁尾區段的內容物件。Specifies the content to display for the footer section of a object.| ||指定要顯示的標頭區段的內容物件。Specifies the content to display for the header section of a object.| ||指定要顯示在插入模式中的項目內容物件。Specifies the content to display for an item in insert mode in a object. 此範本僅支援控制項。This template is supported only by the control.| ||指定要顯示的項目中的內容物件。Specifies the content to display for the items in a object.| 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 做為定義自訂替代或範本，您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段設定其他屬性的屬性物件物件。As an alternative to defining a custom or template, you can customize the header and footer sections of a object by setting other properties of the object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or the property, respectively. 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像屬性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在物件藉由設定屬性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別的繫結欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要顯示或隱藏在資料繫結控制項的整個標頭區段，使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性 （如果有的話）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂同一資料格會顯示兩個欄位的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom object that displays two fields in the same cell. 名字和最後一個名稱欄位會放在同一個結合物件。The first name and last name fields are combined into the same object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/CS/templatefieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/VB/templatefieldvb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: TemplateField();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件，定義適當的範本，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, define the appropriate templates, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將欄位資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/CS/templatefieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/VB/templatefieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate AlternatingItemTemplate { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.ITemplate AlternatingItemTemplate

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示 物件中替代項目的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the alternating items in a object.

value.span: 實作的物件，包含顯示 中替代項目的樣板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the alternating items in a .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的替代項目中顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the alternating items in a object. 藉由建立的範本，指定替代項目呈現的方式定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the alternating items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 屬性通常用於搭配屬性以建立資料繫結控制項中的每個其他項目不同的外觀。The property is commonly used in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的屬性，以建立自訂範本的替代項目欄位資料行中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the alternating items in a field column of a control. 此範本是一種所指定的範本屬性，其中的影像會顯示儲存格的相對的一邊。The template is a variation of the template specified by the property, where an image is displayed on the opposite side of the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值指示是否應將 物件繫結至的值轉換成 (如果其為 )。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value that the object is bound to should be converted to if it is .

value.span: 如果應將 繫結至的值轉換成 (當其為 時)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value that the is bound to should be converted to when it is ; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性適用於在範本中所做的雙向資料繫結陳述式。This property applies to two-way data-binding statements made in the template. 表示轉換已完成之後從雙向繫結的範本，再將值傳遞給更新或插入作業的資料來源擷取的值。The conversion is done after extracting the values from the two-way bound template, and before passing the values to the data source for an update or insertion operation. 例如，使用者可能輸入空字串 ("") 為欄位值，在更新或插入記錄。For example, a user might enter an empty string ("") for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用屬性來指定空字串值是否會自動轉換為`null`資料欄位的資料來源中的更新時。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source.

summary.span: 將目前 衍生物件的屬性複製至指定的 物件。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current -derived object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來複製目前的內容-衍生物件方法所建立的物件。The method is a helper method used to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object created by the method.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

span.span: Creates a new object.
Always returns a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底的方法來傳回物件。The method overrides the base method to return a object.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，務必建立新的執行個體，您的型別並不會呼叫基底方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to create a new instance of your type and not call the base method.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示 物件中處於編輯模式之項目的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a object.

value.span: 實作的物件，包含顯示 中處於編輯模式之項目的樣板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定項目處於編輯模式中顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item that is in edit mode in a object. 藉由建立指定的呈現方式編輯模式中的項目範本中定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how an item in edit mode is rendered. 屬性通常會包含輸入的控制項的使用者修改資料來源中的值。The property usually contains input controls for the user to modify a value in a data source. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，在編輯模式中建立自訂範本的項目欄位資料行中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in edit mode in a field column of a control. 範本也包含驗證伺服器控制項，以防止使用者將數值欄位保留空白。The template contains validation server controls to prevent a user from leaving a value field empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 依一或多個雙向繫結陳述式 () 的指定，從目前資料表儲存格抽取資料控制項欄位的值，並將這些值加入至指定的 集合。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control fields as specified by one or more two-way binding statements () from the current table cell and adds the values to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法藉由衍生自型別，例如。The method is implemented by types derived from , such as . 呼叫這個方法會擷取範本來填入要傳遞給資料來源的更新、 插入或刪除作業的字典中的雙向資料繫結欄位的值。This method is called to extract the values of two-way data-bound fields in the template to populate dictionaries to be passed to the data source for an update, insert, or delete operation. 欄位/值組會儲存在傳遞給方法的字典集合。The field/value pair is stored in the dictionary collection that is passed to the method. 方法透過呼叫`ExtractRowValues`方法的資料控制項，例如和。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的頁尾區段中顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed in the footer section of a object. 建立範本，指定如何轉譯的頁尾區段中定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the footer section is rendered. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來建立自訂範本的頁尾區段欄位中的資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the footer section of a field column in a control. 範本會顯示在值的總和欄位資料行。The template displays the sum of the values in the field column. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldFooterTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldFooterTemplate/CS/templatefieldfootertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldFooterTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldFooterTemplate/VB/templatefieldfootertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的標頭區段所顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the header section of a object. 建立指定的標頭區段的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header section is rendered. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來建立自訂範本的標頭區段欄位中的資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the header section of a field column in a control. 範本會顯示核取方塊，可讓使用者顯示或隱藏的資料列控制項。The template displays a check box that allows the user to show or hide the rows of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/CS/templatefieldheadertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/VB/templatefieldheadertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，當您建立使用自訂資料繫結控制項物件初始化的資料格的資料或控制項的資料表結構。Call this method when you are creating a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示 物件中處於插入模式之項目的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a object.

value.span: 實作的物件，包含顯示 中處於插入模式之項目的樣板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定在插入模式中的項目所顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item in insert mode in a object. 建立指定的項目在插入模式下的呈現方式的範本定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the item in insert mode is rendered. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的資料繫結控制項支援此範本才支援資料繫結控制項，可讓您插入記錄，例如此範本控制項。Not all data-bound controls support this template This template is supported only by data-bound controls that allow you to insert a record, such as the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，在插入模式中建立自訂範本的項目欄位中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in insert mode in a field row in a control. 範本會顯示控制項，可讓使用者從預先定義的清單中選取值。The template displays a control that allows the user to select a value from a predefined list. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的項目中顯示的自訂內容物件。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the items in a object. 藉由建立一個指定的項目如何轉譯範本中定義的內容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地定義屬性結合屬性以建立資料繫結控制項中的每個其他項目不同的外觀。You can optionally define the property in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定的範本，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下來，加入在開頭和結尾之間的自訂內容``標記。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以是以純文字格式一樣簡單或複雜 （將其他控制項內嵌在範本中，例如）。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以程式設計方式存取在範本中定義的控制項，請先判斷哪些資料繫結控制項中的物件包含的控制項。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下來，使用集合物件來存取控制項。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 您也可以使用方法要尋找控制項，控制項必須有物件指定屬性。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來建立自訂範本的項目欄位控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the items of a field in a control. 範本會顯示該欄位的值在控制項。The template displays the field's value in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldItemTemplate/CS/templatefielditemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldItemTemplate/VB/templatefielditemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 判斷 物件中包含的控制項是否支援頁面回呼。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support page callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不支援此類別，一律會擲回例外狀況。The method is not supported for this class and always throws a exception.

exception.span: 會呼叫這個方法的預設實作。

span.span: The default implementation of this method is called.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
